Title: Makes provisions relating to loitering in a transportation facility
Summary: Provides that a person is guilty of loitering when such person remains in a transportation facility, within twenty-five feet of the token booth or similar location, for more than twenty-five minutes unless authorized to do so or unless the facility's design would make it impossible to maintain a greater distance.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to loitering
